message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. This is a special offer tailored to your level of interest and the perceived value of the product to you, which is estimated at $8,000. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you soon.
